sentences.sContent: We provide a social programme throughout the year and give help and advice through one-to-one tutorials and individualised work.
sentences.sContent_eng: We provide a social programme throughout the year and give help and advice through one-to-one tutorials and individualised work.
sentences.sCn: 我们全年举办许多联谊活动，并透过一对一的指导和个别练习来提供帮助和建议。
